√vṛh 'tear'

present: [6.] vṛháti  bṛháti etc.  

perfect: vavárha V.+  

aorist: [1.] varhi   -- [3.] avīvṛhat  avavarhat   -- [5.] barhīs  barhīt   -- [7.] avṛkṣat etc.  

[future: varkṣyati  varhiṣyati  varḍhā  varhitā  ]

verbal: vṛḍhá  bṛḍha  vṛḍhvā  varhitvā  -vṛ́hya  -vṛhas  -várham  -barham  

secondary: passive: vṛhyate etc.   -- intensive: varīvṛh-   -- desiderative: vivṛkṣa-  vivarhiṣa-   -- causative: barháyati etc.  varhita  

derivatives: -vṛha S.+  barha AV.+  varha AV.+  barhin E.  varhin E.  bárhaṇa AV.+  várhaṇa AV.+  barhís? V.+  

Compare √bṛh. THe confusion of b and v goes back to the oldest time.
